Text.val: 03.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
10.01.2010 GB SCR Changed value of parameter if BMQ001 is called
11.07.2006 SH SCR11560 Extended selection of part 1 with "or BPIV_PAYENTCODE = GSET_PAYMENTCODE (GSET_ID = 215)
28.03.2006 AK SCR10724 add part 2 using BADT and BADP
05.01.2006 SH SCR10014 Multiple changes, see SCR for details
23.11.2005 AK SCR9548 replacy GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE with GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE
11.11.2005 SH SCR9480 Removed call of BMQ015 to delete MQ 111
04.11.2005 SH SCR9414 Changed calculation of V.TOTALDIFFERENCE

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select BADP_ID, BADP_BANK_ADMNO, BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO
from :1/BADT join :1/BADP on BADT_BANK_ADMNO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADT_BANKID = BADP_BANKID and BADT_BANKACCOUNT = BADP_BANKACCOUNT and BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT= BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER = BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER and BADP_AMOUNTEXCHDIFFH <> 0
where BADT_HANDLINGDATE = ':2'
order by BADT_BANK_ADMNO, BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO
for fetch only optimize for 100 row
